books.name: J.K. Rowling
books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.description: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends a magical school, where he uncovers a dark secret.

books.name: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian regime where the government watches everyone and controls thought.

books.name: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.title: The Hobbit
books.description: A hobbit embarks on an unexpected journey to reclaim a lost kingdom from a fearsome dragon.

books.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.description: A mysterious millionaire throws lavish parties in pursuit of an unrequited love during the Jazz Age.

books.name: Harper Lee
books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.description: A young girl navigates the challenges of race and justice in the American South during the 1930s.

books.name: Herman Melville
books.title: Moby-Dick
books.description: The quest of Captain Ahab to hunt down the elusive white whale, Moby-Dick, aboard the whaling ship Pequod.

books.name: Jane Austen
books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.description: A story about the complexities of love, class, and misunderstandings as Elizabeth Bennet navigates life and relationships.

books.name: Mary Shelley
books.title: Frankenstein
books.description: A scientist creates a sentient creature in an unorthodox experiment, leading to tragic consequences.

books.name: Leo Tolstoy
books.title: War and Peace
books.description: A vast narrative exploring Russian society during the Napoleonic Wars, focusing on five families.

books.name: Emily Brontë
books.title: Wuthering Heights
books.description: A dark and passionate tale of the intense love between Catherine Earnshaw and Heathcliff, set on the Yorkshire moors.

books.name: Mark Twain
books.title: The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn
books.description: The story of a young boy's adventures along the Mississippi River as he seeks freedom.

books.name: Gabriel García Márquez
books.title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
books.description: The multi-generational story of the Buendía family in the fictional town of Macondo.

books.name: Chinua Achebe
books.title: Things Fall Apart
books.description: The story of the rise and fall of Okonkwo, a leader in the Igbo community in Nigeria.

books.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.title: Tender Is the Night
books.description: A novel that explores the lives of American expatriates on the French Riviera during the 1920s.

books.name: Khaled Hosseini
books.title: The Kite Runner
books.description: A tale of friendship and redemption set against the backdrop of a changing Afghanistan.

books.name: C.S. Lewis
books.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
books.description: Four siblings discover a magical world and help to save it from the White Witch.

books.name: J.D. Salinger
books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.description: A teenage boy's experiences in New York City after being expelled from prep school.

books.name: Harper Lee
books.title: Go Set a Watchman
books.description: The sequel to 'To Kill a Mockingbird,' exploring themes of racism and personal growth.

books.name: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.description: A young hobbit named Frodo Baggins embarks on a perilous journey to destroy the One Ring.

books.name: Margaret Atwood
books.title: The Handmaid's Tale
books.description: In a dystopian future, women are subjugated and used for reproductive purposes.
